Utils Widgets Logic Module¶

class proteus.utils.widgets_logic.document_dialog_logic.DocumentDialogLogic(parent)¶

Class that contains the logic of the document dialog.

Select archetype to clone.

Parameters:

archetype – archetype index.

Clone document archetype and adds to project documents list.

Parameters:

archetype – archetype index.

class proteus.utils.widgets_logic.main_window_logic.MainWindowLogic(parent)¶

Class that contains the logic of the main window.

Parameters:

obj – The object to be cloned and inserted.

Adds an item to the combo box.

select_object(index: QModelIndex) → None¶

Updates selected object, focus object and enables accepted archetypes in the ribbon.

Parameters:

index – index of object in the QTreeWidget.

class proteus.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.CreateDocument(project: Project, document: Object, app, index: int)¶

Command to create project documents.

redo(self)¶
undo(self)¶
class proteus.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.CreateObject(project: Project, parent_obj: Object, obj: Object)¶

Command to insert an object to a given parent. Adds a previously cloned object to the end of parent children list.

redo() → None¶

Inserts object to parent children list. Set object state to FRESH. Set parent’s object to DIRTY.

undo() → None¶

Removes object from parent children list. Removes object state. Set parent’s state to previous state.

proteus.utils.widgets_logic.qundo_commands.change_combo_box(app)¶

This function changes the combo box of the document dialog. And updates the combobox with the new documents.
